Blacknightmare:

"If you said that you aren't the best choice of me due tha=
t rampage status, she isn't safe neither... do you think that I was safe in=
side Unicron's base???? he in a second can command destroy a bot witout rea=
son and the other minios are dangerous as him... I can care myself... Do yo=
u think that you was the only one that I met? have you have an idea how man=
y times I helped him serving as spy? and how many times did I fooled them a=
nd betray them when I finished my misiions?? let them die in his craws?? "
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, April 07, 2005 10:52 PM
  Subject: Re: Wolf Tear=
s


  Malice:  

  "I'm not denying anything.  I'm trying to save you a lot=
 of trouble.  You don't know me well enough to stay around me.  I do love y=
ou, and I want the best for you.  My mood and temperment can change at the =
slightest provocation.  I'm not mentally stable, it takes my total concentr=
ation to remain somewhat civil.  I can't guarentee your safety, that is why=
.  You may wake up on day and find me on a rampage, you'd have to destroy m=
e or run as far away as you could.  I love you, but I want you to be safe. =
 And besides, there's more than this base and this little war here.  When U=
nicron is defeated, you will have the oppertunity to travel freely, meet ot=
her bots.  You should not try to settle down with the first bot you meet.  =
Think of this as a grace period.  Go and see other bots, you may find I am =
not the best choice in the universe."
